addEndpoint : function(target,
params)
Adds an Endpoint to a given element.
Default jsPlumb Anchors.
animate : function(el,
properties,
options)
Wrapper around standard jQuery animate function; injects a call to jsPlumb in the ‘step’ function (creating it if necessary).
connect : function(params)
Establishes a connection between two elements.
The CSS class to set on Connection canvas elements.
Default jsPlumb Connectors.
These are the default settings for jsPlumb, that is what will be used if you do not supply specific pieces of information to the various API calls.
The numeric interval (in milliseconds) at which the resize event polling loop executes.
detach : function(sourceId,
targetId)
Removes a connection.
detachAll : function(el)
Removes all an element’s connections.
detachEverything : function()
Remove all Connections from all elements, but leaves Endpoints in place.
The CSS class to set on Endpoint canvas elements.
Default jsPlumb Endpoints.
This working example, complete with fully commented code, illustrates a few ways in which this plugin can be used.
hide : function(el)
Sets an element’s connections to be hidden.
Version: 1.1, Last updated: 3/14/2010
Copyright © 2010 “Cowboy” Ben Alman, Dual licensed under the MIT and GPL licenses.
makeAnchor : function(x,
y,
xOrientation,
yOrientation,
xOffset,
yOffset)
Creates an anchor with the given params.
removeAllEndpoints : function(el)
Removes all Endpoints associated with a given element.
removeEndpoint : function(el,
endpoint)
Removes the given Endpoint from the given element.
repaint : function(el)
Repaints an element and its connections.
repaintEverything : function()
Repaints all connections.
Fired when an element’s width or height changes.
setAutomaticRepaint : function(value)
Sets/unsets automatic repaint on window resize.
setDefaultNewCanvasSize : function(size)
Sets the default size jsPlumb will use for a new canvas (we create a square canvas so one value is all that is required).
Sets whether or not a given element is draggable, regardless of what any plumb command may request.
setDraggableByDefault: function(draggable)
Sets whether or not elements are draggable by default.
setRepaintFunction : function(f)
Sets the function to fire when the window size has changed and a repaint was fired.
show : function(el)
Sets an element’s connections to be visible.
sizeCanvas : function(canvas,
x,
y,
w,
h)
Helper to size a canvas.
Information about what version or versions of jQuery this plugin has been tested with, what browsers it has been tested in, and where the unit tests reside (so you can test it yourself).
Throttle the native window object resize event to fire no more than once every jQuery.resize.delay milliseconds.
Toggles draggability (sic) of an element’s connections.
Toggles visibility of an element’s connections.
unload : function()
Unloads jsPlumb, deleting all storage.
